file.name: pathParamNotRequired.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: My API Spec
paths:
  /{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
      - in: path
        name: id
      responses:
        200:
          description: Ok

Error: parse: paths: /{id}: get: operation "": parameters: parse parameter "id": path parameters must be required
